text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    51725-0ESTABLISHMENT REGISTRATION
    53411-5OUT OF BUSINESS NOTIFICATION
    51726-8NDC/NHRIC LABELER CODE REQUEST
    69968-6NDC LABELER CODE INACTIVATION
    71743-9GENERIC DRUG FACILITY IDENTIFICATION SUBMISSION
    72090-4IDENTIFICATION OF CBER-REGULATED GENERIC DRUG FACILITY
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/spl/CodeSystem/codesystem-fhirMessageTypes
    CodeDisplay
    01Establishment Inactivation
    02GDUFA Facility Inactivation

name: OrganizationSubmissionMessageTypes
description: The set of message types that are allowed as a FHIR organization submission.
